Package GUI

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ColumnWidthsJTable
    A JTable that has column widths adjusted to fit either the column headers or the maximum size text in the column.
    EndScreen
    Implements the sailing screen for the game.
    GameEnvironment
    This class initializes GameLogic which is used to run the main logic and launches the application windows for the GUI.
    IslandActionListener
    Implements a Listener that checks to see if a JButton have has been pushed.
    MainGameScreen
    MainGameScreen contains code for the applications main GUI, anything that happens that needs to be displayed visually to the player during game-play is visible here and any input by the player that is required for game-play is able to be input here.
    MouseEvents
    Implements a Listener that checks to see if a Mouse event has occurred on a given component.
    SailScreen
    Implements the sailing screen for the game.
    SetUpScreen
    This class builds the SetUpScreen window which gives the player a GUI where they can decide on certain options for their game such as: choosing their displayed name in game, choosing how many days they want the game to last for (game length) and choosing the ship they would like to play the game with(this affects certain statistics for the player).
    ShipActionListener
    Implements a Listener that checks to see if a JButton has been pushed.
    SpinnerListener
    Implements a Listener that checks to see if a JSpinners have had its values changed.
    StartUpScreen
    Code for window that displays when launching the application.
    StoreTableModel
    Defines the table model for the displaying the Items from the Store during the game.
    StoreTableSelectionModel
    Defines the selection model for selecting Items from the Store during the game.
